remarks: A sufficient condition for the derivative of a product to be continuous.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
dvmulcncf.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. { RR , CC } ) $.
dvmulcncf.f $e |- ( ph -> F : X --> CC ) $.
dvmulcncf.g $e |- ( ph -> G : X --> CC ) $.
dvmulcncf.fdv $e |- ( ph -> ( S _D F ) e. ( X -cn-> CC ) ) $.
dvmulcncf.gdv $e |- ( ph -> ( S _D G ) e. ( X -cn-> CC ) ) $.
dvmulcncf $p |- ( ph -> ( S _D ( F oF x. G ) ) e. ( X -cn-> CC ) ) $.
